text:
(1)
Bayonne Bridge from No. 33 Nicholas Ave., in Staten Island.
November 4, 1931.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)
Bayonne Bridge from R.R. bank, Staten Island. The R.R. is the Staten Island Rapid Transit Railway.
November 4, 1931.

P. L. Sperr.

(3)
The same, as seen from the Elizabeth New Jersey Ferry.
June 14, 1935.

P. L. Sperr.
(No. 3, not a dry mount item.)
title: Bridges - Bayonne Bridge - [View from Staten Island Rapid Transit Railway railroad bank.]
